Title: Little Dipper
Writer: Alex Hirsch (creator), Timothy McKeon, Zach Paez, Alex Hirsch
Actors: Kristen Schaal, Jason Ritter, Alex Hirsch, Jennifer Coolidge
Plot: Dipper finds a magic crystal with the ability to grow and shrink anything, but Gideon gets his hands on it and tries to get revenge on Stan and take the Mystery Shack.
